item.description:
BOSTON HARBOR BLUES FESTIVAL
at the Spectacle Island Marina

Boat departs at 12:00 noon and returns at 6:00 pm.

Meet at the New Boston Boat on the docks between 11 and 11:15 am.  We board at 11:30 am. 

Boat arrives at the Island at 1 pm and departs at 5 pm. Music will be on the boat and you are welcome to explore the island if you like. 

The island has a swimming beach, hiking trails, snack bar with burgers, hot dogs, and snacks.  So feel free to bring your bathing suit, walking shoes, etc. 

The music will be playing on the boat all afternoon!

Enjoy a FUN afternoon listening to great blues music! 

Featuring the following bands and more....

  • The Love Dogs http://www.thelovedogs.com/
  • Basic Black w/The Cadillac Horns and
  • Toni Lynn Washington http://www.myspace.com/thetonilynnwashingtonband
  • George Gritzbach Band http://www.georgegritzbachband.com/
  • Roger Ceresi & the All Starz http://www.rogerceresi.com/allstarz.html

 

Meet us at Rowes Wharf on the docks by the New Boston Boat behind the Boston Harbor Hotel (Massachusetts Bay Lines). $20 includes boat and concert.

You may bring food and non-alcoholic beveragaes. It is highly recommended you bring your own lunch, as there may not be any food available for sale on the boat. However, there is a cash bar and burgers and hot dogs on the island for sale..

You are not allowed to bring alcoholic beverages.  Coolers will be checked when boarding the boat. 

I will be reserving tickets for everyone so be sure to RSVP if you plan on coming. 

For directions and parking information, click here...

Feel free to arrange your own carpools by using the comments section below.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the ticket booth area.
item.name: Boston Harbor Blues Fest
